## ðŸŽ¯ The 16 Features

### ðŸ” Security (4 features)

- **sandbox** - Isolated execution

### âš¡ Performance (5 features)
- **native** - C/C++ code
- **gc** - GC control
- **inline** - Optimization

- **simd** - Vectorization

### ðŸŽ¯ Convenience (4 features)

### ðŸ“Š Advanced (3 features)
